messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3fdde99ed034 ***

doc: remove roadmap document

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5726047

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

FYI the roadmap is very inaccurate now, and it would be silly to write
a new one. It would just say "we're gonna use go 1 for a while before
deciding what to do next".

On 3 March 2012 12:33,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg
>
>
> Description:
> doc: remove roadmap document
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5726047/
>
> Affected files:
>  M doc/contrib.html
>  R doc/devel/index.html
>  R doc/devel/roadmap.html
>
>

subject: code review 5726047: doc: remove roadmap document
